name: Sanity: Complete Loan Journey in one go
description: Runs the full loan journey from start to finish with a fresh mobile number, validating all major checkpoints.
descriptionHtml: Runs the full loan journey from start to finish with a fresh mobile number, validating all major checkpoints.
